data.title: Congratulations to the Athletes Selected for the 2024 Junior Nexus Championship
data.meta_description: VIRGINIA BEACH, Va. - USA Field Hockey is excited to announce the athletes who have been selected to compete in the 2024 Nexus Championship, presented by Osaka Hockey, that will take place this July in Virginia Beach, Va. This selection marks the compl...
data.text:
VIRGINIA BEACH, Va. - USA Field Hockey is excited to announce the athletes who have been selected to compete in the 2024 Nexus Championship, presented by Osaka Hockey, that will take place this July in Virginia Beach, Va. This selection marks the completion of the Regional Selection Camp sessions and the next step in the Olympic Development Pathway and tryout process for the Junior U.S. Women’s National Teams.

USA Field Hockey would like to thank and congratulate the thousands of athletes and coaches from across the country who worked, trained, and competed in the 2024 Nexus and Junior National Team programming.

The players who have been selected will receive an email within the next 24 hours with registration details.

In the event that an invited player is unable to attend, alternates are listed below and will be notified if a roster position opens in their respective age group.

The Nexus Championship will take place July 6 through July 16 at the Virginia Beach Regional Training Center in Virginia Beach, Va. At the conclusion of the Nexus Championship, top performing athletes in qualifying age groups will be invited to participate in the 2024 AAU Junior OlympicGames and additional Junior USWNT selection opportunities.

Selections for the Senior Nexus Championship will be announced following the conclusion of all High Performance Center training opportunities. Additional members of the 2024 Junior U.S. National Teams will compete in the Senior Nexus Championship.
